src:
三菱自、「ｉ―ＭｉＥＶ」など２万台リコール

07 Nov 2019, 08:51

　三菱自動車は７日、「ｉ―ＭｉＥＶ」など２車種計１万９７９９台（２００９年７月～１９年７月製造）のリコールを国土交通省へ届け出た。国交省によると、ブレーキ部品の構造が不適切なため、水分が入って腐食し、ブレーキの制動距離が長くなる恐れがある。問い合わせは、０１２０・３２４・８６０。
text:
Mitsubishi recalls 20,000 units such as “i-MiEV”

07 Nov 2019, 08:51

MITSUBISHI MOTOR CO., LTD. Reported to the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism on the 7th the recall of a total of 19,799 vehicles (manufactured from July 2009 to July 19) including two models such as “i-MiEV”. According to the MLIT, the brake parts are improperly structured, which can cause moisture to corrode and increase the braking distance of the brake. The inquiry is 0120/324/860.
